Package input_handlers

package input_handlers
This package contains the classes that handle input from the user.
  • Class
    Description
    EnumInputHandler
    Input handler for enum values.
    EnumInputHandler.EnumInputException
    Exception for enum input handler, thrown when input is unsuccessful, in file console mode.
    NumberInputHandler
    Input for numeric values.
    NumberInputHandler.NumberChecker<T extends Number>
     
    NumberInputHandler.NumberInputException
    Exception for number input, thrown when conversion is unsuccessful.
    NumberInputHandler.NumberValidationException
     
    WorkerInputHandler
    Input handler for worker elements of the collection.
    WorkerInputHandler.WorkerInputException
    Exception for worker input handler, thrown when input is unsuccessful.
